item.title: Games, C++ and Unity
item.description: A lot has been said and written lately about the game industry’s “C++ is not changing into the thing we need” feelings. Valid criticism on various things that make C++ not a great language for games (or at all), and valid counter criticism of “well why dont you guys participate in the open-for-everyone process of designing C++ instead of bitching from the sidelines”. Let’s talk about the place C++ will have at Unity in the future:
